::Feline::

She took hits in the legs and lower torse.  She got knocked down as 
one shot hit her and grazed the side of her cheek.  She had a line of 
mech fluid running down her cheek.  She growled and returned fire at 
Gigas. Then turns anf fires at Krachen.  

(Two shots each)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Sigh.
> 
> BIC: Horn Drill dodges, smiling at his perfect dodge. Grenade flies 
up again
> but gets hit on the foot.
> 
> "Ow! Doh!" Grenade cries out. Gigas is hit but doesn't move. He 
notices
> someone hit him 5 second later and fires 3 times at Feline. Kracken 
and
> Beholder are hit and get knocked into eahc other. Each fire at 
Feline
> twice...
